SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwMSBattleBotsFightScript

Begin Ondeath
	if GetIsReference fbmwBattleBot1 == 1
		if fbmwMSBattleBots1.BetOn == 1
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.Win to 2
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.battleOn to 0
		else
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.Win to 1
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.battleOn to 0
		endif
	else
		if fbmwMSBattleBots1.BetOn == 2
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.Win to 2
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.battleOn to 0
		else
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.Win to 1
			set fbmwMSBattleBots1.battleOn to 0
		endif
	endif
	end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 450 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
